original_text: I have given all the gifts that the Israelites offer to the Lord to you, your sons and your daughters. That is a rule for all time. That is the Lord's special promise to you and to your descendants for all time.’
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께 거제로 드리는 모든 성물은 내가 영구한 몫의 음식으로 너와 네 자녀에게 주노니 이는 여호와 앞에 너와 네 후손에게 영원한 소금 언약이니라

sentences.original_text: I have given all the gifts
that the Israelites offer to the Lord
to you, your sons and your daughters
That is a rule for all time
That is the Lord's special promise
to you and to your descendants for all time
